mapper.select: SELECT d.id, d.text, CASE WHEN d.parent IS NULL THEN '#' ELSE d.parent END AS parent, 'default' AS type, NULL AS menuOrder, NULL AS position FROM department d UNION ALL SELECT u.username AS id, u.name AS text, u.parent AS parent, 'file' AS type, u.position AS menuOrder, NULL AS position FROM user u WHERE u.parent IS NOT NULL

SELECT u.*, d.text AS text, f.new_filename AS new_filename -- 프로필 이미지 파일명 추가 FROM user u LEFT JOIN department d ON u.parent = d.id LEFT JOIN file f ON f.code_name = 'up100' -- 프로필 이미지 코드 AND f.pk_idx = u.username -- 사용자와 파일의 연결 WHERE u.username = #{username}

SELECT d.id, d.text, d.parent, 'default' AS type, NULL AS menuOrder, NULL AS position FROM department d UNION ALL SELECT u.username AS id, u.name AS text, u.parent AS parent, 'file' AS type, u.position AS menuOrder, NULL AS position FROM user u WHERE u.parent IS NOT NULL
SELECT ds.*, f.new_filename FROM direct_store ds LEFT JOIN file f ON f.pk_idx = ds.parent WHERE ds.parent = #{departmentId} AND f.code_name = 'bl001'
